ygData.subject: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently in HH collecting extra ringmail to sell in Halas so I can have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so boring.  I have
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently in HH collecting extra ringmail to sell in Halas so I can
have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so boring. I
have nevered seen that named gnoll fellow even though I spend most of my
time hunting gnolls. At any rate, it there a better place for a level 17
Warrior to get herself a magic weapon then HH (or saving up plat for a
combine sword).



For the Honor and or May the blessings of
Glory of Rallos Zek; Tunare be with you;

Patty of Halas Patty Treehugger
Barbarian Warrior Princess (17) Half Elf Ranger (9)
username: Patricia username: Patty
server: Bristlebane server: Bristlebane
